    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) static java.lang.String fragmentShaderCode 
      (package private) static java.lang.String pointFragmentShader 
      (package private) static java.lang.String pointVertexShader 
      (package private) static java.lang.String vertexShaderCode
      vertexShaderCode- Vertex shader code, which will be attached to the game engine fragmentShaderCode- Fragment shader code, which will be attached to the game engine pointVertexShader- Point Vertex shader code, which will be attached to the game engine, used in Triangle Shader Creator pointFragmentShader- Point Fragment Shader code, which will be attached to the game engine, used in Triangle Shader Creator

      • createAndLinkProgram

        static final int createAndLinkProgram(int vertexShaderHandle,
                                      int fragmentShaderHandle,
                                      java.lang.String[] attributes)
        Method is responsible for creating and linking GLES20 program.
        Parameters:
        vertexShaderHandle - Vertex shader handle object
        fragmentShaderHandle - Fragment shader handle object
        attributes - Additional attributes like: "a_Position","a_Color","a_Normal","a_TexCoordinate"
        Returns:
        if successful, it will return values other than 0

      • compileShader

        static final int compileShader(int shaderType,
                               java.lang.String shaderSource)
        Method is responsible for compiling shader program.
        Parameters:
        shaderType - Type of shader
        shaderSource - Source of shader.
        Returns:
        if successful, it will return values other than 0
